trans-unit.source: How to: Query for Duplicate Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ) (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 查询目录树 (LINQ) (Visual Basic 中) 中的重复文件 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: How to: Query for Duplicate Files in a Directory Tree (LINQ) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 查询目录树 (LINQ) (Visual Basic 中) 中的重复文件

trans-unit.source: Sometimes files that have the same name may be located in more than one folder.
trans-unit.target: 有时具有相同名称的文件可能位于多个文件夹。

trans-unit.source: For example, under the Visual Studio installation folder, several folders have a readme.htm file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Visual Studio 安装文件夹中，多个文件夹具有 readme.htm 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to query for such duplicate file names under a specified root folder.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何查询此类重复名称的文件名在指定的根文件夹下。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows how to query for files whose size and creation times also match.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例显示如何查询文件的大小和创建时间也匹配。

trans-unit.source: The first query uses a simple key to determine a match; this finds files that have the same name but whose contents might be different.
trans-unit.target: 第一个查询使用一个简单的键以确定匹配;这将查找的文件具有相同的名称，但其内容可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The second query uses a compound key to match against three properties of the <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个查询使用的复合键匹配的三个属性<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>对象。</xref:System.IO.FileInfo>

trans-unit.source: This query is much more likely to find files that have the same name and similar or identical content.
trans-unit.target: 此查询，则更有可能找到具有相同的名称和内容类似或相同的文件。

trans-unit.source: Create a project that targets the .NET Framework version 3.5 or higher with a reference to System.Core.dll and a `Imports` statement for the System.Linq namespace.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5 或更高版本对 System.Core.dll 的引用与项目和一个`Imports`System.Linq 命名空间的语句。
